Text:
Fantastic! Well done to you sir and to WikiLeaks!

This is our information, paid for by us the UK tax payers, UK Gov and Royal Mail have no right to lock this info up!

Also available from these links if this torrent doesn't work -

Thanks uploader :)
I wonder what a criminal would do with this information...
